anger.text: Let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger; for the anger of man does not produce the righteousness of God.
Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, and give no opportunity to the devil.

unforgiveness.text: Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.

distance|disconnected|drift.text: Two are better than one... a cord of three strands is not quickly broken.

fear|anxious|worry.text: Do not be anxious about anything... and the peace of God... will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
Cast all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.

hopeless|giving up|divorce.text: What therefore God has joined together, let not man separate.
Rejoice in hope, be patient in tribulation, be constant in prayer.

communication|listen|listening.text: If one gives an answer before he hears, it is his folly and shame.
Let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger.

love|kindness|compassion.text: Love is patient and kind; love does not envy or boast; it is not arrogant or rude...
Put on... compassionate hearts, kindness, humility, meekness, and patience... and above all these put on love.

trust|betrayal|hurt.text: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart... and he will make straight your paths.

gratitude|thankful.text: Rejoice always, pray without ceasing, give thanks in all circumstances; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.
